```{r include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE) 
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(wordcloud2)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, fig.width = 20, fig.height = 10)

#Load CSV file
sR <- read_csv("master.csv")
```

Temp Sample Data

```{r echo=FALSE}
listTodata <- split.data.frame(sR, sR$year)

slice_sample(as.data.frame(listTodata$`1985`), n=20) %>% select(country, year, sex, age, suicides_no)

slice_sample(as.data.frame(listTodata$`1998`), n=20) %>% select(country, year, sex, age, suicides_no)

slice_sample(as.data.frame(listTodata$`2016`), n=20) %>% select(country, year, sex, age, suicides_no)

```

Temp Hist

```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(as.data.frame(listTodata$`1998`), aes(x=generation, y=suicides_no)) + geom_col()
```

Useless Word Cloud: 

```{r echo=FALSE}
wc_countrySR <- sR %>%  select("word" = country) %>% transform(freq=ave(seq(nrow(sR)),word,FUN=length)) %>% distinct
wordcloud2(data=wc_countrySR, size=0.45 , color = 'random-light', shape = 'pentagon', backgroundColor="black")
```
